sentences.sentence: "I don't know why they left," he said dolefully.
sentences.translation: “我不知道他们为什么离开，”他悲伤地说。

sentences.sentence: The man dolefully said, "my wife wants to live in a stone castle."
sentences.translation: 男人悲伤地说：“我妻子想住在石筑城堡里。”

sentences.sentence: I ought to yell, "said my father dolefully."
sentences.translation: “我应该吆喝才是，”父亲悲戚地说。
